numericalExperiment.rationale: To explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state (from 'A Summary of the CMIP5 Experiment Design' by Karl Taylor et al. 2008)

numericalRequirement.name: 2.1.ic
numericalRequirement.description: A description of initial condition for the control run

numericalRequirement.name: 2.1.bc.sst
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed SST anomolies (relative to exp 3.3) based on either (a) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 4.1) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 3.2), OR (b) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 1.2) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 1.1)

numericalRequirement.name: 2.1.bc.sst
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed Sea Ice concentration anomolies (relative to exp 3.3) based on either (a) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 4.1) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 3.2), OR (b) climatology difference between years 2026-2035 (from expt 1.2) and years 1979-2008 (from expt 1.1)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.wmg.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.aer_pre.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.wmg.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.sls.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1.bc.aer_pre.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalExperiment.longName: CMIP5 Tier 1 Time-slice experiment 2.1 - Future "time-slice" experiment
